title: Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) between  Sri Lanka and the State of Qatar on Visa exemption of citizens who are holders of Diplomatic, Special and Official Passports
decision_details: - The proposal made by Hon. S.B. Navinne, the Minister of  Internal Affairs, Wayamba Development and Cultural Affairs, to sign a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) between Sri Lanka and the State of Qatar on Visa exemption of citizens in Sri Lanka and Qatar who are holders of Diplomatic, Special and Official Passports, with a view to strengthening the friendly relations between Sri Lanka and the State of Qatar, was approved by the Cabinet.
